00013 abstract class MOC_Api_Abstract implements MOC_Api_Service_Interface {
00019     public $Configuration;
00020 
00026     protected $apiPrefix;
00027 
00033     protected $enforceValidation = true;
00034 
00040     protected $invokeMethod = 'call_user_func';
00041 
00047     public function __construct() {
00048         $this->Configuration = new MOC_Configuration();
00049 
00050         // Execute bootstrap method
00051         $this->bootstrap();
00052     }
00053 
00062     public function provides($method) {
00063         return method_exists($this, $this->getMethodName($method));
00064     }
00065 
00078     public function invoke($method, $data) {
00079         // Store parameters and method name in Configuration
00080         $this->Configuration->set(compact('method', 'data'));
00081 
00082         // Check if the class provides the method
00083         if (!$this->provides($method)) {
00084             throw new BadMethodCallException(sprintf('Method "%s" (%s) is not implemented by "%s"', $this->getMethodName($method), $method, get_class($this)));
00085         }
00086 
00087         // Check if can validate the method arguments
00088         if (!$this->runValidateMethodArguments($method, $data)) {
00089             throw new MOC_Api_Exception(sprintf('Parameter validation failed for method "%s" (%s)', $this->getMethodName($method, 'validate'), $method));
00090         }
00091 
00092         // Run global initialize
00093         $this->initialize();
00094 
00095         // Intialize method if needed
00096         $this->runInitializeMethod($method);
00097 
00098         // Invoke the actual message
00099         $return = $this->invokeMethod(array($this, $this->getMethodName($method)), $data);
00100 
00101         // Invoke the after method
00102         return $this->runAfterMethod($method, $return);
00103     }
00104 
00110     protected function boostrap() {
00111 
00112     }
00113 
00119     protected function initialize() {
00120 
00121     }
00122 
00132     protected function invokeMethod($callback, $params) {
00133         switch ($this->invokeMethod) {
00134             case 'call_user_func':
00135                 return call_user_func($callback, $params);
00136             case 'call_user_func_array':
00137                 return call_user_func_array($callback, $params);
00138             default:
00139                 throw new MOC_Api_Exception(sprintf('Invalid invoke method "%s"', $this->invokeMethod));
00140         }
00141     }
00142 
00150     protected function runValidateMethodArguments($method, $data) {
00151         $validateMethod = $this->getMethodName($method, 'validate');
00152         if (!method_exists($this, $validateMethod)) {
00153             // Don't warn if we dont enforce validation
00154             if (!$this->enforceValidation) {
00155                 return true;
00156             }
00157             throw new MOC_Api_Exception(sprintf('Method "%s" for "%s" is not implemented by "%s"', $validateMethod, $method, get_class($this)));
00158         }
00159 
00160         return $this->invokeMethod(array($this, $validateMethod), $data);
00161     }
00162 
00170     protected function runInitializeMethod($method) {
00171         $method = $this->getMethodName($method, 'initialize');
00172         if (method_exists($this, $method)) {
00173             $this->invokeMethod(array($this, $method));
00174         }
00175     }
00176 
00186     protected function runAfterMethod($method, $data) {
00187         $method = $this->getMethodName($method, 'after');
00188         if (method_exists($this, $method)) {
00189             $data = $this->invokeMethod(array($this, $method), $data);
00190         }
00191         return $data;
00192     }
00193 
00206     protected function getMethodName($name, $prefix = 'execute') {
00207         if (!empty($this->apiPrefix)) {
00208             $name = str_replace($this->apiPrefix, '', $name);
00209         }
00210         $name = MOC_Inflector::camelize(str_replace('.', '_', $name));
00211         return $prefix . $name;
00212     }
00213 }
